name: Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest
name_original: Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest
description:
Embark on a spine-tingling journey where exploration is key. Traverse the landscape of Serpent Ridge National Forest as you SEARCH FOR LOST KEYS, uncovering the secrets that lurk within the shadows.

Face the unknown and test your survival instincts as you HIDE from the dangers that prowl your surroundings. With every new path you choose to explore, the line between safety and peril becomes increasingly thin. Seek shelter and survive the night, overcoming the challenges that await in this atmospheric walking simulator.

"Six Cabins" seamlessly blends environmental horror with puzzle solving, offering a unique and captivating gaming experience. Can you unravel the mysteries, or will you succumb to the dark forces that linger within the "Six Cabins in Serpent Ridge National Forest"?



CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move
Space Bar - Jump
Left CTRL - Crouch
E - Interact
R - Radio On
F - Radio Channel Scan
Right Mouse Click - Flashlight On/Off
Left Mouse Click - Attack
